title: Bride by Arrangement
description: This collection invites readers to three weddings by arrangement. Mary Jo Putney"Wedding of the Century"Stunningly beautiful, extraordinarily wealthy and sold to the highest bidder for the price of a dukedom--Sarah Vangelder wanted more than just a bartered marriage!Merline Lovelace"Mismatched Hearts" A willful noblewoman and honor-bound baron fight their attraction, hoping beyond hope that their previous betrothals can be unarranged in time to tie the right knot.Gayle Wilson"My Darling Echo" Blinded in the Peninsular War, the Earl of Huntington thought to marry his widowed secretary for convenience, never realizing that Bella and her son would bring light back into his darkened world.
author: Mary Jo Putney
